brand.name: Teasers CLE
brand.tagline: Where anticipation is the main course.
brand.mission: Teasers CLE is a Cleveland-based experiential dining and nightlife brand merging fine cuisine, art, and performance into unforgettable sensory experiences.
brand.positioning: Teasers CLE blends the intimacy of a supper club with the visual allure of modern art — a space where dining becomes theater and every event feels like a secret worth sharing.

story.origin: Born from the original Teasers concept, Teasers CLE began as a series of pop-up dinners in underground spaces across Cleveland. Each event teased the senses — dimly lit rooms, curated playlists, and daring tasting menus — until demand transformed it into a full experiential brand.
story.vision: To redefine what dining can be by crafting nights that linger long after the last glass is cleared.

events.name: Carnival After Dark
events.description: Trinidad Carnival energy with roaming glow stations, wining lessons, and a soca DJ pushing the pace all night.
events.tagline: Bring the mas to the midnight hours.
bar: Port of Spain Sunset — coconut rum + mango
events.vibe: Costume encouraged, glitter glow-ups, Carnival choreography pop-ups.

events.name: The Fete
events.description: All-inclusive Caribbean party with endless punch, champagne, and a pure dance floor experience.
bar: The Fete — overproof rum, lime, bitters
Trini Mule — aged rum, ginger beer
events.vibe: All-inclusive wristbands, dancehall-to-soca marathon, daylight-strobing lighting.

events.name: Rum & Riddim
events.description: Premium rum flights ease into a reggae and soca party with percussion breaks.
events.tagline: Taste the terroir, then turn up.
bar: Kingston Sour — rum, lime, silky foam
events.vibe: Guided tasting 9–9:30, then selectors trade riddims until close.

events.name: Island Street Food Soirée
events.description: A standing-room market mash-up with elevated Trinidad street eats and constant circulation.
events.vibe: Ambient vendors, live painters, riddim-driven flow.

events.name: Independence Fete
events.description: Red, white, and black pride party celebrating Trinidad & Tobago Independence.
events.tagline: Raise the flag, raise the energy.
bar: Red White Black — layered celebration shot
events.vibe: Dress code in national colors, anthem drop at midnight, flag waiving crowd.

events.name: Afrobeat Nights
events.description: Pan-African dance party blending Afrobeats, amapiano, and soca with runway moments.
bar: Lagos to POS — rum, ginger, bitters
events.vibe: Fashion showcase, dance battles, projection-mapped visuals.

events.name: Kingston Meets Port of Spain
events.description: Jamaica and Trinidad collide in a reggae vs. soca sound clash night.
bar: Two Islands — JA x TT rum blend
events.vibe: Flag waving, DJ battle scoreboard, mid-party crowd judging.

events.name: Diaspora Sessions
events.description: Black excellence nightlife featuring R&B, Afrobeats, and soca rotation with VIP hosting.
bar: Black Gold — cognac, sorrel, gold flakes
events.vibe: High fashion dress code, velvet VIP sections, polished service.

events.name: White Party: Emerald Edition
events.description: All-white elegance with emerald lighting, steel pan intro, and house music finale.
events.vibe: Live pan to deep house transition, photo sets, shimmering dress code.

events.name: Neon Noir
events.description: Futuristic Caribbean underground with UV lighting and experimental bites.
bar: Rose Gold Rush — rum, rose, gold
events.vibe: House/soca remixes, fashion-forward guests, light-reactive dress preferred.

events.name: Velvet & Smoke
events.description: Speakeasy Caribbean luxury with smoked cocktails and jazz-soca fusion.
events.vibe: Candle glow, vinyl DJ moments, intimate seating pockets.

events.name: Carnival Prep Night
events.description: Get mas-ready with costume fittings, stamina cocktails, and wine-up practice.
events.tagline: Prep the body. Prime the vibe.
events.vibe: Mas band aesthetic, choreography stations, fitness-percussion mashup.

events.name: Warehouse Fete
events.description: Late-night sound system culture with raw industrial staging and street food cones.
events.vibe: Strobe smoke, projection grit, sunrise cooldown beats.

menu.title: Doubles Shooters
menu.description: Mini curry chickpea doubles in shooter form with cucumber chutney.

menu.title: Jerk Chicken Lollipops
menu.description: Slow-smoked drumettes with charred pineapple glaze and scotch bonnet honey.

menu.title: Bake & Shark Sliders
menu.description: Crispy white fish in coconut bake with tamarind sauce and fresh slaw.

menu.title: Suya Skewers
menu.description: Peanut-spiced beef skewers with cooling lime yogurt and hibiscus pickles.

menu.title: Ceviche Champagne Spoon
menu.description: Citrus shellfish ceviche served in chilled spoons with bubbles.

menu.title: Energy Mas Bowl
menu.description: High-protein quinoa, roasted plantain, callaloo pesto and grilled shrimp.

menu.title: The Mas
menu.description: Spiced rum, passionfruit, lime, bitters and nutmeg foam.

menu.title: Port of Spain Sunset
menu.description: Coconut rum, mango nectar, ginger, and citrus smoke.

menu.title: Lagos to POS
menu.description: Dark rum, ginger, bitters, palm sugar and charred orange.

menu.title: Electric Emerald
menu.description: Gin, tonic, chlorophyll, glow tonic and edible glitter.

menu.title: Mas Ready
menu.description: Hydrating rum punch with coconut water, electrolytes and citrus.

menu.title: Rum Flight
menu.description: Curated aged and overproof rum tasting with chocolate + citrus pairings.

menu.title: Champagne Service
menu.description: Signature roaming champagne cart with hibiscus pearls and sorrel reductions.

press.quote: Teasers CLE is rewriting the city's nightlife — where dinner becomes performance art.
A sensory playground that feels like a dream sequence with flavor notes.
Part culinary experience, part art installation — Teasers CLE is a brand to watch.

takeover.name: Teasers Takeover
takeover.tagline: Transform your venue into a one-night Emerald Noir experience.
takeover.summary: We bring DJs, performers, signature lighting, roaming cocktails, and our guestlist energy. You provide the space—we build the night Cleveland talks about.

process.title: Concept Call
process.details: Align on theme, capacity, production budget, and revenue model. Choose between Carnival After Dark, Neon Noir, Rum & Riddim, or a custom concept.

process.title: Takeover Kit
process.details: Receive moodboards, run-of-show, staffing needs, custom menu, and marketing assets so your team is in sync.

process.title: Marketing Push
process.details: Teasers handles RSVPs and promo drops; venue co-promotes. Optional sponsor integration and influencer suite.

process.title: Show Day
process.details: We stage lighting and sensory elements, brief staff, and run the show—from the first cocktail to the last encore moment.

process.title: Post-Event Debrief
process.details: Receive photo selects, performance metrics, and next steps for residencies or recurring nights.

packages.title: Essentials
packages.description: DJ, host/MC, lighting wash, Teasers-branded marketing + RSVP funnel.
packages.idealFor: Weekday or late-night buyouts wanting a quick energy lift.

packages.title: Signature
packages.description: Essentials plus roaming cocktail carts, curated passed bites, performers or percussionists, and ambient decor.
packages.idealFor: Prime-night takeovers aiming for a full vibe flip.

packages.title: Flagship
packages.description: Signature plus custom set builds, sponsor integrations, influencer content suite, and post-event aftermovie.
packages.idealFor: Large venues or brands seeking a statement collaboration.

whyBarsLoveIt: New audience: Our guestlist arrives early, spends heavy, and shares content.
Content machine: Walk away with cinematic photo/video assets for your own channels.
Repeatable format: Rotate themes monthly for a recurring residency.
Sponsor-ready: Easily integrate rum houses, fashion partners, or local brands.
